publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2796.1 Jackson Carlaw: Damages (Asbestos-related Conditions) (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2796) in the name of Fergus Ewing, insert at end "but, in so doing, notes the terms of the Justice Committee’s Stage 1 report, in particular the concerns expressed with regard to the Financial Memorandum, and calls on the Scottish Government to provide the Parliament with a more detailed analysis of the likely cost implications, from such information as is available to or can be obtained by the Scottish Government, prior to the Bill being considered at Stage 3."
